title.narrative: (China) Country Programming Framework for Inclusive and Sustainable Industrial Development 2021-2025

description.narrative: This Country Programming Framework (CP) is designed to enhance UNIDO#s support to the Government of China to implement a roadmap towards Inclusive and Sustainable Industrial Development (ISID) as stated in the Lima Declaration adopted on 1 December 2013 during the 15th session of the General Conference of UNIDO. In doing this, UNIDO has aligned the priorities for China to the 14th Five Year Plan, building on the achievements of past projects and programs. It is also in line with the United Nations Sustainable Development Cooperation Framework for China (2021-2025). As industrialization is a long-term endeavor involving many stakeholders, efforts will be made to strengthen synergies by collaborating with development cooperation partners. As a framework based on established national priorities, it will be the essential guide for selecting UNIDO#s interventions in China over the next 5 years.
